column4: hi all: i need to change the firefox.js file in /usr/lib/mozilla-firefox/defaults/pref, but it says in Properties-->Permissions Tab "You are not the owner, so you can't change these permissions." How do I become the owner? Is being the owner the same as sudo?
why do you need to change the permissions?
I want to modify the file, so that I can customize how Firefox works. Check out http://www.mozilla.org/support/firefox/tips
that should be able to be changed within ff
if you can't do it within the UI, you should edit the one in ~/.mozilla/
how do you change it within ff?
how do i go to that folder?
which funny labelled ir? (Do you mean "dir")?
